title: Generated report
mission: Produce a refactoring plan that decomposes the overall Mathematics-focused goal into domain-aligned sub-goals (algebra, calculus, geometry, probability & statistics, discrete math, modeling). For each sub-goal, map concrete artifacts (roadmap sections, coverage-matrix rows, bibliography tags) and specify per-cycle targets (deliverables and measurable milestones) suitable for iterative execution by specialist agents. The output should be directly usable as input to downstream document or task-generation agents.
